title-group.article-title: Ethics as Social Practice: Debating Ethics in Qualitative Research

permissions.copyright-statement: Copyright Center for Historical Social Research / Zentrum für Historische Sozialforschung

abstract.p: Ethical issues have become increasingly important in research involving human beings. It is fitting, therefore, that FQS devotes a debate focusing on issues that are concerned with the many layers of decision making when it comes to ethics in qualitative research. In this contribution, I use a personal context to formally introduce the ethics debate. I extend an invitation to readers to contribute to this debate of ethical issues in qualitative research.
